summary:
Summary of Vulcan Steel Limited ASX Announcement (24 June 2025):

  • Banking Covenant Extension: Covenant threshold relaxation extended to 30 June 2026 (previously expiring 31 December 2025).
  • Liquidity Position: Strong liquidity maintained; no debt maturities until FY27.
  • Rationale: Preemptive move to preserve working capital flexibility amid uncertain economic conditions.

No material capital-raising, trading halt, or operational/financial data identified.
